New Track Premiere: 'Allegory (Freestyle)'

Leon Nduati
Leon Nduati
January 10, 2025

New Track Premiere: 'Allegory (Freestyle)'

Technical Details

  • BPM: 84
  • Key: C minor

I'm excited to share my latest freestyle, Allegory (Freestyle). This one-minute rap is a display of raw energy, sharp lyricism, and unfiltered expression. Allegory (Freestyle) is a punchy, high-intensity track that encapsulates a moment of lyrical prowess. Every bar carries weight, packed with meaning and layered wordplay. I had so much fun working on this one. It's been ages since the last Klense song hit streaming and I thought, "What better way to come back into the spotlight than to give the people that braggadocio Klense sound?"

Production Notes

The track features:

    • Hard-hitting boom-bap drums
    • Gritty, old-school hip-hop sampling
    • Aggressive, rapid-fire delivery
    • A raw, unfiltered mix to retain its freestyle essence
    • An audio excerpt from a friend at the end. He was spittin' lowkey too üî•
